an10.124:1.1: “Mendicants, these ten things don’t arise apart from the Holy One’s training.
an10.124:1.3: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.124:1.4: These are the ten things that don’t arise apart from the Holy One’s training.”
